snippet: As the presenting sponsor of the festival for the first time, the company is introducing an effort, “Film for All,” that aims to expose the festival to more New Yorkers.
abstract: Advertising column; AT&T, presenting sponsor of Tribeca Film Festival for the first time, is introducing an effort called Film for All that aims to expose festival to more New Yorkers; will pay for thousands of people to see film on one of last days of festival, along with showing film at parks this summer.
lead_paragraph: As the presenting sponsor of the festival for the first time, the company is introducing an effort, “Film for All,” that aims to expose the festival to more New Yorkers.

headline.main: Free-for-All on the Final Friday of Tribeca Film Festival
headline.print_headline: Free-for-All on the Final Friday of a Film Festival
